cui_name: Prognostic Stage IV Breast Cancer AJCC v8
reasoning: Stage IV breast cancer (metastatic disease) using prognostic staging AJCC v8. Prognostic and anatomic stage IV represent similar populations (metastatic disease). Global incidence ~5.2 per 100k based on proportion of stage IV cases at diagnosis.
source: Amin MB et al. (2017). AJCC Cancer Staging Manual (8th ed.). Springer International Publishing
